name: Maneuver (Alpha)
description:
A 2-D platformer with a sketchbook art style. Take control of a hero with gun that is a bit too powerful. Use your skills and the knockback from firing to traverse through levels.

This is a very early incomplete version of the project. Things like music, sounds and menus are still being worked on and there are probably many bugs that I have not found. Feel free to comment any bugs no matter how big or small.

I hope you all enjoy this little thing I've been working on.
